titles.title: The Blood Of The Passover Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Oh the blood of the Passover Lamb
Is applied to the door of our lives
No power of darkness can ever withstand
The force of the blood sacrifice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tho' Satan will bring accusations
We let him know right where we stand
For now there is no condemnation
We're under the blood of the Lamb

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
We're under the blood of the Lamb
That covers the guilt of our past
By the mercy of God, holy and righteous we stand

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
We're under the blood of the Lamb
We're safe and secure from the enemy's plan
No weapon formed against us will stand
We're under the blood of the Lamb
